issue.title: [CF 1197] Show target hp in the icon.
issue.body:
Is it possible to show in the icon current target hp in % instead of ability cooldown for example?


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad | Imported from CurseForge issue #1197 | Raw

comments.body:
Sure. Add the appropriate dog tag the icons text displays. Type /dt to view available tags.

Edited Apr 30, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks man! It's just really cool. I wish you can help me with my other issue for which I have opened ticket too.


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad
